item.title: 波兰发行美元债券，再掀地区外汇债务热潮
item.description: 波兰在数月内第二次重返国际市场，出售美元债券，以满足创纪录的融资需求。【原文：Poland is returning to international markets for a second time in as many months, selling dollar-denominated bonds as part of efforts to cover record financing needs.】

item.title: 工会请求法院阻止财政部将数据提供给马斯克的数字政府办公室
item.description: 一群工会要求法院下达临时命令，阻止美国财政部将美国人的个人和财务数据交给与埃隆-马斯克的政府效率执行团队有关的人员。【原文：A group of unions asked for a temporary court order to stop the US Treasury Department from handing over personal and financial data on Americans to people associated with Elon Musk’s team of government efficiency enforcers.】

item.title: 肯尼亚中央银行连续第四次下调关键利率
item.description: 肯尼亚中央银行连续第四次下调基准利率，因为通胀率稳定在目标区间的下限。【原文：Kenya’s central bank cut the benchmark interest rate for the fourth time in a row as inflation sits comfortably at the lower end of its target band.】

item.title: 土耳其加入新兴市场债券热潮，2025 年首次出售美元债券
item.description: 在新兴市场债务销售繁忙的一周里，土耳其政府正寻求锁定低借贷成本，出售本年度第一笔美元债券。【原文：Turkey is selling its first dollar-denominated bond of the year as the government seeks to lock in low borrowing costs in a busy week for emerging-market debt sales.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长莱恩表示，在通胀风险面前需要灵活的利率政策
item.description: 欧洲中央银行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）认为，由于通胀风险仍然双向存在，欧洲中央银行应继续灵活制定货币政策。【原文：The European Central Bank should remain agile in setting monetary policy since inflation risks remain in both directions, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 南非联合政府消除分歧
item.description: 南非执政联盟的两个主要成员经过几个月的内讧之后，似乎又回到了正轨。【原文：South Africa’s ruling coalition appears to be back on track after months of infighting between its two main members.】

item.title: 麦格理关闭美国债务资本市场，转向私人信贷业务
item.description: 据知情人士透露，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）正在关闭其美国债务资本市场部门，该部门的业务包括杠杆贷款发放、银团贷款和交易，将把资源集中用于私人信贷。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. is shuttering its US debt capital markets arm, a business that includes leveraged loan origination, syndication and trading, to focus resources on private credit, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 雪佛龙正就委内瑞拉问题与特朗普政府接触
item.description: 雪佛龙公司正在与特朗普政府沟通，因为一些共和党人呼吁美国吊销该公司在委内瑞拉的经营许可证。【原文：Chevron Corp. is in communication with the Trump administration as some Republicans call for the US to revoke the company’s license to operate in Venezuela.】

item.title: 亚马逊的臃肿之战疏远了工人，取悦了华尔街
item.description:
在重返办公室政策更加普遍、技术就业市场逐渐降温的背景下，劳动力重组运动正大行其道。【原文：

Campaign to restructure workforce is capitalizing on a moment when return-to-office policies are more common and the technology job market is cooling off.

】

item.title: 俄罗斯人寻求保护储蓄，推动黄金购买量创历史新高
item.description: 俄罗斯人去年购买了创纪录数量的黄金，因为他们试图在制裁中保护自己的储蓄，购买量相当于该国年产量的四分之一。【原文：Russians bought a record amount of gold last year as they sought to protect their savings amid sanctions, obtaining the equivalent of about a fourth of the country’s annual output.】

item.title: 特朗普上任前美国贸易赤字膨胀，关税承诺掷地有声
item.description: 2024 年底，美国贸易赤字急剧扩大，原因是唐纳德-特朗普开始第二任总统任期前进口激增，以及他兑现了全面征收关税的承诺。【原文：The US trade deficit widened sharply at the end of 2024 on a surge in imports prior to the start of Donald Trump’s second term as president and his follow-through on the promise of sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 加拿大与美国的石油贸易顺差创 2022 年以来新高
item.description: 去年年底，加拿大对美国的能源出口猛增，使加拿大对其最大客户的贸易顺差达到两年多来的最高点。【原文：Canada’s energy exports to the US jumped at the end of last year, pushing the country’s trade surplus with its biggest customer to the highest in more than two years.】

item.title: 贝森特财政部坚持耶伦时代的长期债务计划
item.description: 尽管新上任的财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）在被选中之前曾批评过前任财政部长的发行策略，但美国财政部周三仍坚持其在 2025 年之前保持长期债务销售不变的指导原则。【原文：The US Treasury on Wednesday maintained its guidance on keeping sales of longer-term debt unchanged well into 2025, despite newly installed Secretary Scott Bessent having criticized the issuance strategy of his predecessor before he was picked for the job.】

item.title: 北爱尔兰评估特朗普与欧盟贸易战的风险
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战有可能给北爱尔兰带来新的脱欧创伤。【原文：Donald Trump’s trade war is threatening to open fresh Brexit wounds in Northern Ireland.】

item.title: ADP 数据显示美国企业新增就业岗位 18.3 万个，高于预期
item.description: 1 月份美国公司的就业人数增幅超过预期，凸显出尽管不确定性不断增加，但就业增长仍具有韧性。【原文：Employment at US companies picked up in January by more than forecast, highlighting resilient job growth despite mounting uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国邮政撤销停止向中国发货的决定
item.description: 美国邮政服务公司（US Postal Service）表示，它正在接受来自中国和香港邮政的 "所有国际入境邮件和包裹"，从而收回了几个小时前才宣布的停止部分海外运输的决定。【原文：The US Postal Service said it’s accepting “all international inbound mail and packages” from China and Hong Kong Posts, walking back an announcement made only hours earlier to halt some overseas shipments.】

item.title: 美联储主席巴金称官员们希望明确政策和增长方向
item.description: 里士满联邦储备银行行长托马斯-巴尔金（Thomas Barkin）加入了央行官员的行列，表示他们需要更多时间来了解美国经济和通胀的走向，因为美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政策存在较大的不确定性。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Richmond President Thomas Barkin joined a chorus of central bank officials who’ve said they need more time to understand where the US economy and inflation are headed amid elevated uncertainty about President Donald Trump’s policies, strengthening expectations for rates to remain on hold.】

item.title: 丹麦将加强对俄罗斯影子舰队油轮的审查
item.description: 丹麦将加强对通过其狭窄海峡运输俄罗斯石油的船只的检查，以保护环境和海上安全，防止莫斯科影子船队中的老旧船只对环境造成影响。【原文：Denmark will ramp up inspections of ships transporting Russian oil through its narrow straits, in an effort to protect the environment and maritime safety from older vessels in Moscow’s shadow fleet.】

item.title: DeepSeek 的忧虑仍在持续，Arm 的 "怪物 "估值面临考验
item.description: 自 DeepSeek 引发人们对人工智能设备支出前景的担忧以来，Arm Holdings Plc 的表现好于大多数半导体股。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc has fared better than most semiconductor stocks in the days since DeepSeek sparked concerns about the outlook for spending on artificial intelligence gear — but its steep valuation leaves it with plenty to prove.】

item.title: 阿波罗计划建立首个私人信贷市场
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is seeking to build a marketplace that would allow investors to buy and sell high-grade private assets more easily, while encroaching further into terrain once dominated by the biggest Wall Street firms.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦大亨正在商谈向国家支付 10 亿美元的事宜
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦最富有的人之一正在商谈向国家支付约 10 亿美元，作为政府对该国首任总统时期积累的财富进行调查的一部分。【原文：One of Kazakhstan’s richest men is in talks to pay about $1 billion to the state as part of a government investigation into wealth accumulated under the country’s first president.】

item.title: 美国威胁贸易，加拿大寻求更多途径向中国运输石油
item.description: 自加拿大跨山输油管扩建工程于今年 5 月竣工以来，几乎每天都有一艘满载油砂原油的油轮从温哥华狮门大桥下驶过，前往太平洋周边的炼油厂。【原文：Almost every day since the expansion of Canada’s Trans Mountain pipeline was completed in May, a tanker laden with oil sands crude shipped through the line has passed under Vancouver’s Lions Gate Bridge en route to refineries around the Pacific.】

item.title: 俄罗斯一月份石油预算收入接近一年最低水平
item.description: 由于全球原油价格疲软以及对国家炼油厂的支付增加，俄罗斯 1 月份国家预算中的石油收入接近一年来的最低水平。【原文：Russia’s proceeds from oil in the state budget in January were near a one-year low due to weaker global crude prices and higher payouts to the nation’s refiners.】

item.title: 中国的贸易报复是一种警告，为达成协议留有余地
item.description:
在中国政府对华盛顿关税闪电战的首次回应中，大豆和其他备受瞩目的目标被排除在外。这绝非偶然。【原文：

Soybeans and other high-profile targets were left out of Beijing’s first response to Washington’s tariff blitz. That’s no accident.

】

item.title: 杜克大学的 Cam Harvey 称投资组合再平衡的成本高达 160 亿美元
item.description: 在华尔街这个急功近利的时代，这是一个公开的秘密：投资者像上了发条一样按部就班地调整自己的股票和债券投资组合，却受制于 "快钱 "投机者的 "跑马圈地"。【原文：It’s an open secret in this need-for-speed era on Wall Street: Investors, who adjust their stock-bond portfolios like clockwork on regular schedules, are at the mercy of front-running by fast-money speculators.】

item.title: 波兰延长利率暂停期，经济岌岌可危
item.description: 波兰中央银行将其稳定利率期延长至第 16 个月，经济增长的预期反弹增加了行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）反对降息的理由。【原文：Poland’s central bank extended its period of stable interest rates into 16th month with an expected rebound in economic growth adding to Governor Adam Glapinski’s arguments against the need for cuts.】

item.title: Neuberger Berman 将从 Fintech 购买 10 亿美元消费债务
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，Neuberger Berman 集团将在未来几年内从消费贷款机构 ClarityPay 购入多达 10 亿美元的贷款，这标志着这家金融技术初创公司达成了最大的购买协议。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group is buying as much as $1 billion of loans from consumer lender ClarityPay over the course of the next few years, marking the largest purchase agreement for the financial technology startup, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: Uber 股价因第一季度总预订量指引疲软而下跌
item.description: 优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc. 发布的第一季度预订前景令分析师失望，该公司警告称，货币逆风和恶劣的冬季天气将对当期的出行和交付产生影响。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. issued a first-quarter bookings outlook that disappointed analysts, cautioning that currency headwinds and severe winter weather would have an impact on trips and deliveries in the current period.】

item.title: 奈拉表现持续稳定，尼日利亚扩大美元使用范围
item.description: 尼日利亚中央银行已将外汇局的美元准入期限延长了四个月，因为当地流动性的改善促进了奈拉近期的上涨。【原文：Nigeria’s central bank has extended the dollar access of foreign exchange bureaus by four months, amid improved local liquidity that has contributed to recent naira gains.】

item.title: 任天堂投资者透过严峻的销售形势展望 Switch 2 的光明未来
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，弗拉德-萨沃夫（Vlad Savov）惊叹于任天堂销量暴跌与股价飙升之间的反差。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Vlad Savov marvels at the contrast between Nintendo’s plummeting sales and rocketing share price.】
